title: After a Monthlong Delay, Here's How You Can Preorder the OnePlus 15
description: The US launch of the new OnePlus 15 was delayed by a month, but these freebies with your preorder sort of make up for it.
content: Some of you may not be familiar with OnePlus devices. While they aren't as well-known as Apple's iPhones or the Samsung Galaxy, these Android phones are extremely powerful and have a lot to offer. In… [+1810 chars]
